title: Eagles’ Super Bowl Win Delivers Record Audience of 126 Million
description: Fox’s Sunday-evening broadcast of the Philadelphia Eagles’ Super Bowl 59 win over the Kansas City Chiefs is projected to have drawn a total audience of 126 million viewers, Fox Sports reported on Monday. That projected tally encompasses Fox, Fox Deportes, Tubi, Telemundo and NFL digital properties, and if it holds marks a record high for the […]
author: Matt Webb Mitovich

title: Nobody Wants This Promotes Jackie Tohn to Series Regular for Season 2 (Exclusive)
description: Nobody Wants This wants more Esther. The hit Netflix rom-com has promoted Jackie Tohn, who plays Esther Roklov, to series regular for Season 2, TVLine has learned exclusively. Tohn heavily recurred in the first season as the sister-in-law of Adam Brody’s character and the wife of Timothy Simons’ Sasha. After Rabbi Noah (Brody) started dating […]
author: Vlada Gelman
